interpretation: The Brain card represents intelligence and the power of reasoning. It signifies the ability to analyze situations and make informed decisions. This card indicates that you possess a high level of knowledge and have a logical mind. It is a reminder to trust your instincts and use your intelligence to navigate difficult situations. The Brain card also indicates that your memory is sharp and that you are able to recall important details easily. This card can also represent the need to challenge yourself intellectually and to continue learning and expanding your knowledge. Be confident in your intelligence and let it guide you in all aspects of your life.
